title: Thriller Tour Group - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Horror   Mystery   Shounen Ai   Supernatural
tags: Animal Characteristics   Antihero Protagonist   Calm Protagonist   Charismatic Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Folklore   Ghosts   Gore   Handsome Male Lead   Insects   Leadership   Loyal Subordinates   Manipulative Characters   Masochistic Characters   Misunderstandings   Multiple Personalities   Mutated Creatures   Mutations   Romantic Subplot   Shapeshifters   Slow Romance   Spirits   Sudden Strength Gain   Survival Game   Twisted Personality   Unlimited Flow
author: 燕孤鸿
description:
Nearing the end of his life, Wei Xun was dragged into a thrilling and supernatural voyage.

Here, he was surprised to find that he could not only prolong his life, but also experience the feeling of pain that he loved!

In this regard, Wei Xun, the patient who was suffering from analgesia, responded—I am extremely satisfied!>
